question: What are the top three tourist attractions in Tokyo, and can you generate an image of the Tokyo Tower?
true_answer: The top three tourist attractions in Tokyo are Tokyo Tower, Senso-ji Temple, and Shibuya Crossing. Image of the Tokyo Tower generated.

steps.content: What are the top three tourist attractions in Tokyo, and can you generate an image of the Tokyo Tower?
Plan: 1) Search for the top three tourist attractions in Tokyo. 2) Generate an image of the Tokyo Tower. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the top three tourist attractions in Tokyo.
The top three tourist attractions in Tokyo are Tokyo Tower, Senso-ji Temple, and Shibuya Crossing.
Generating an image of the Tokyo Tower.
Image of the Tokyo Tower generated.
Can you also tell me how tall the Tokyo Tower is?
Plan: 1) Search for the height of the Tokyo Tower. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the height of the Tokyo Tower.
The Tokyo Tower is 333 meters tall.
The top three tourist attractions in Tokyo are Tokyo Tower, Senso-ji Temple, and Shibuya Crossing. Image of the Tokyo Tower generated. The Tokyo Tower is 333 meters tall.
